dct_title_s: A view of the course of the Ganges, through the country in the dry season ; Inland navigation of the River Ganges
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Includes profile: Section of the Ganges. In upper right-hand corner: No. 41. "See Rennell's memoirs of a Map of Hindoostan." Date of publication suggested by ms. note on map. Rennell's Memoir was first published in 1783.
